About Us
About Colku
Colku is located in Foshan City, Guangdong, China. It is a national high-tech enterprise integrating scientific research, development, production, sales and service. The company has a registered capital of 35 million yuan, an annual output of 200 thousand units, an area of about 32 thousand square meters, and more than 300 employees. Yaofa Electric Appliance Factory, Colku's parent company, was founded in 1989 and has been rooted in the manufacturing industry for 34 years. It has mastered the core technology of refrigeration equipment, adhered to the production of high-quality refrigeration equipment as the core, and always adhered to the concept of "bringing fresh and cool experience for outdoor and vehicle life" to serve the customer.
Colku has been focusing on mobile refrigeration for 24 years. It is committed to develope and manufacture mobile and outdoor refrigeration products, which are widely used in cars, yachts, truck, outdoor camping and also at home. Products cover parking air conditioners, RV air conditioners, camping air conditioners, car refrigerators, camping refrigerators and customized fridges for new energy vehicle.
Enterprise Certification
Early in 1999, Colku has qualified with ISO9001 Management System and also with IATF16949 in the year 2021. Products have successively obtained certifications such as UL, ETL,SAA, GS, CE, CB, CCC, RoHs, Reach, etc., and win more than 100 patents. We have industry-leading automatic production lines for parking air conditioners and car refrigerators, and intelligent digital quality control management system (the MES), to assurance reliable quality products. Over the years, our products have been widely praised by many consumers with reliable quality and innovative technology.
Cooperative Partner
In the past 23 years, Colku's products have been exported to 56 countries and regions abroad, such as Australia, the USA, Germany, France, UAE, Japan, Korea, etc. The global cumulative sales volume exceeded 1 million units. Now Colku has developed to be a professional ODM/OEM manufacturer of truck air conditioners and car refrigerators. Colku has successfully exported its products to 56 countries and regions, establishing itself as a core supplier for reliable brands in the German and Australian industries. In China mobile refrigeration industry market, we rank the top 5 leading brand. We have 28 core distributors and more than 2600 cooperated shops and service points.
Company Overview
Today, we own 4 factory sites, with 50000 square meters workshop, and over 300 employees; we have the capacity of over 60,000pcs monthly output with 4 assembly lines. Also we have experienced R&D engineer team who can develop new model from design, moulding to off-tool sample in only 90 days with low developing cost.
Concentrate on manufacturing high-quality products, bringing valuable profits to distributors, and offering better life experience to customers is the concept Colku insisting all the time.
In the past decades, Colku has earned a lot of great reputation and feedback from the suppliers and customers, which owes to we insist on the quality control, pursuit of improvement and innovation on the products and offer reliable after service.
